First, may I have your email?.message: প্রথমত, আমি কি আপনার ইমেইল পেতে পারি?

Next, what languages do you speak?.message: এরপর, আপনি কোন ভাষায় কথা বলেন?

Would you mind receiving updates on what.message: আমি কী নিয়ে কাজ করছি সে সম্পর্কে আপডেট পেতে আপনার আপত্তি আছে?

title.description: The title of the fallback page when the page crashed

tryAgain.description: The label of the button to try again rendering when the React error boundary captures an error

p1.message: আপনি যা খুঁজছিলেন তা আমরা খুঁজে পাইনি।
p1.description: The first paragraph of the 404 page

p2.message: দয়া করে সাইটের মালিকের সাথে যোগাযোগ করুন যা আপনাকে মূল URL এর সাথে যুক্ত করেছে এবং তাদের লিঙ্কটি ভাঙ্গা রয়েছে তা তাদের জানান।

note.description: The default label used for the Note admonition (:::note)

tip.description: The default label used for the Tip admonition (:::tip)

danger.description: The default label used for the Danger admonition (:::danger)

info.description: The default label used for the Info admonition (:::info)

caution.description: The default label used for the Caution admonition (:::caution)

buttonAriaLabel.description: The ARIA label for the back to top button

title.description: The page & hero title of the blog archive page

description.description: The page & hero description of the blog archive page

navAriaLabel.description: The ARIA label for the blog pagination

newerEntries.description: The label used to navigate to the newer blog posts page (previous page)

olderEntries.description: The label used to navigate to the older blog posts page (next page)

navAriaLabel.description: The ARIA label for the blog posts pagination

newerPost.description: The blog post button label to navigate to the newer/previous post

olderPost.description: The blog post button label to navigate to the older/next post

plurals.description: Pluralized label for "{count} posts". Use as much plural forms (separated by "|") as your language support (see https://www.unicode.org/cldr/cldr-aux/charts/34/supplemental/language_plural_rules.html)

readMore.description: The label used in blog post item excerpts to link to full blog posts

readMoreLabel.description: The ARIA label for the link to full blog posts from excerpts

plurals.description: Pluralized label for "{readingTime} min read". Use as much plural forms (separated by "|") as your language support (see https://www.unicode.org/cldr/cldr-aux/charts/34/supplemental/language_plural_rules.html)

tagTitle.description: The title of the page for a blog tag

navAriaLabel.description: The ARIA label for recent posts in the blog sidebar

tagsPageLink.description: The label of the link targeting the tag list page

tagsListLabel.description: The label alongside a tag list

tagsPageTitle.description: The title of the tag list page

ariaLabel.message: Switch between dark and light mode (currently {mode})
ariaLabel.description: The ARIA label for the navbar color mode toggle

dark.description: The name for the dark color mode

light.description: The name for the light color mode

navAriaLabel.description: The ARIA label for the breadcrumbs

home.description: The ARIA label for the home page in the breadcrumbs

categoryDescription.description: The default description for a category card in the generated index about how many items this category includes

navAriaLabel.description: The ARIA label for the docs pagination

previous.description: The label used to navigate to the previous doc

next.description: The label used to navigate to the next doc

nDocsTagged.description: Pluralized label for "{count} docs tagged". Use as much plural forms (separated by "|") as your language support (see https://www.unicode.org/cldr/cldr-aux/charts/34/supplemental/language_plural_rules.html)

tagDocListPageTitle.description: The title of the page for a docs tag

unreleasedVersionLabel.description: The label used to tell the user that he's browsing an unreleased doc version

unmaintainedVersionLabel.message: এটি {siteTitle} {versionLabel} এর জন্যে ডকুমেন্টেশন, যা আর সক্রিয়ভাবে রক্ষণাবেক্ষণ করা হয় না।
unmaintainedVersionLabel.description: The label used to tell the user that he's browsing an unmaintained doc version

latestVersionSuggestionLabel.description: The label used to tell the user to check the latest version

latestVersionLinkLabel.description: The label used for the latest version suggestion link label

navAriaLabel.description: The ARIA label for the sidebar navigation

collapseButtonTitle.description: The title attribute for collapse button of doc sidebar

collapseButtonAriaLabel.description: The title attribute for collapse button of doc sidebar

closeSidebarButtonAriaLabel.description: The ARIA label for close button of mobile sidebar

toggleSidebarButtonAriaLabel.description: The ARIA label for hamburger menu button of mobile navigation

expandButtonTitle.description: The ARIA label and title attribute for expand button of doc sidebar

expandButtonAriaLabel.description: The ARIA label and title attribute for expand button of doc sidebar

editThisPage.description: The link label to edit the current page

skipToMainContent.message: স্কিপ করে মূল কন্টেন্ট এ যান
skipToMainContent.description: The skip to content label used for accessibility, allowing to rapidly navigate to main content with keyboard tab/enter navigation

atDate.description: The words used to describe on which date a page has been last updated

byUser.description: The words used to describe by who the page has been last updated

lastUpdatedAtBy.description: The sentence used to display when a page has been last updated, and by who

label.description: The label for the navbar versions dropdown on mobile view
The label for the mobile language switcher dropdown

backButtonLabel.description: The label of the back button to return to main menu, inside the mobile navbar sidebar secondary menu (notably used to display the docs sidebar)

closeButtonAriaLabel.description: The ARIA label for close button of announcement bar

copied.description: The copied button label on code blocks

copyButtonAriaLabel.description: The ARIA label for copy code blocks button

copy.description: The copy button label on code blocks

wordWrapToggle.description: The title attribute for toggle word wrapping button of code block lines

toggleCollapsedCategoryAriaLabel.description: The ARIA label to toggle the collapsible sidebar category

navAriaLabel.description: The ARIA label for the main navigation

toggleButtonLabel.description: The label used by the button on the collapsible TOC component
